mapper.select: SELECT wbGrade FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookMst WHERE jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND subj=#{subj} GROUP BY wbGrade ORDER BY sortCD

SELECT a.jisaCD, #{deptCD} as deptCD, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT_WS('|', a.casKey, a.casSet, a.wbSet, a.wbGrade, a.wbName, IFNULL(b.wbQty,0), IFNULL(c.wbQty,0) ) ORDER BY a.casKey SEPARATOR ',' ) AS alllist ,IFNULL(c.shipevery,'') AS shipevery FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookMst AS a LEFT JOIN globalbiz.IvnWorkBookStockQty AS b ON a.jisaCD = b.jisaCD AND a.subj = b.subj AND a.casKey = b.casKey AND b.deptCD=#{deptCD} LEFT JOIN globalbiz.IvnWorkBookStableQty AS c ON a.jisaCD = c.jisaCD AND a.subj = c.subj AND a.casKey = c.casKey AND c.deptCD=#{deptCD} WHERE a.jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND a.subj=#{subj} GROUP BY RIGHT(a.casKey,2)

SELECT a.jisaCD, #{deptCD} AS deptCD, a.subj, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT_WS('|', a.casKey, a.casSet, a.wbSet, a.wbGrade, a.wbName, IFNULL(b.wbInOutCal,0), IFNULL(b.wbInOutShip,0) ) ORDER BY a.casKey SEPARATOR ',' ) AS alllist FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookMst AS a LEFT JOIN( SELECT a.jisaCD, a.deptCD, b.subj, b.casKey, SUM(IFNULL(b.wbInOutCal,0)) AS wbInOutCal, SUM(IFNULL(b.wbInOutShip,0)) AS wbInOutShip FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutDtl AS b ON a.aidx=b.fidx WHERE a.jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND a.deptCD=#{deptCD} AND a.inOutReqYMD=#{lastship} GROUP BY b.subj, b.casKey )AS b ON a.jisaCD=b.jisaCD AND a.subj=b.subj AND a.casKey=b.casKey WHERE a.jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND a.subj=#{subj} GROUP BY a.subj, RIGHT(a.casKey,2)

SELECT a.subj , globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(#{jisaCD},'0002',a.subj,'E','') AS subjNM FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.SubjInfo AS b ON a.jisaCD=b.jisaCD AND a.subj=b.subj WHERE a.jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND a.deptCD=#{deptCD} AND a.inOutSignYMD=#{lastship} GROUP BY a.subj ORDER BY sortVal

SELECT a.inOutSignYMD, DATE_FORMAT(a.inOutSignYMD,'%m/%d/%Y') AS inOutSignYMDT, a.subj , globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD,'0002',a.subj,'E','Y') AS subjNM , b.casKey, b.wbName , a.inOutReqCD , globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD,'0901',a.inOutReqCD,'E','Y') AS inOutReqCDNM , b.wbStock, b.wbInOut, b.wbStock+b.wbInOut AS Balance FROM globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.IvnWorkBookInOutDtl AS b ON a.aidx=b.fidx WHERE a.jisaCD=#{jisaCD} AND a.deptCD=#{deptCD} AND a.subj=#{subj} AND b.casKey=#{casKey} ORDER BY b.aidx DESC
